Content: No promises that this food is nutritious or nutritionally complete. Only that You get to eat, You get to eat something more than chips.
This guide is designed to simplify feeding yourself, especially when energy or executive function is low. Focus on eating something rather than achieving perfect nutrition.

Half the battle with cooking is having the right ingredients and tools. If you make slightly better decisions, it’s a step in the right direction. Maybe it means eating when you wouldn’t otherwise, or one less order from a restaurant, etc.

Thinking about food as just feeding yourself often makes it harder. It gets easier if you think of it as an indulgence. Optional: Spend a few min in plating, add a drink with your food, an egg in your instant noodles, get a nice ingredient, toast your bread, whatever feels good yk?
If you can order in food, and can afford it, order in. No guilt needed.
When you feel up to it, make a list of 2-3 things you like to eat so that you don’t have to search every time.
